testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should allow QUEUED -> PROCESSING transition
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should allow QUEUED -> PROCESSING transition

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should allow QUEUED -> FAILED transition
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should allow QUEUED -> FAILED transition

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should reject QUEUED -> EDITING transition
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should reject QUEUED -> EDITING transition

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should reject QUEUED -> COMPLETED transition
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should reject QUEUED -> COMPLETED transition

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should allow PROCESSING -> EDITING transition
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should allow PROCESSING -> EDITING transition

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should allow PROCESSING -> FAILED transition
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should allow PROCESSING -> FAILED transition

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should reject PROCESSING -> COMPLETED transition
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should reject PROCESSING -> COMPLETED transition

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should allow EDITING -> COMPLETED transition
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should allow EDITING -> COMPLETED transition

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should allow EDITING -> FAILED transition
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should allow EDITING -> FAILED transition

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should reject all transitions from COMPLETED
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should reject all transitions from COMPLETED

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should reject all transitions from FAILED
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isValidTransition should reject all transitions from FAILED

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine getNextState should return PROCESSING for QUEUED + START_PROCESSING
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine getNextState should return PROCESSING for QUEUED + START_PROCESSING

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine getNextState should return FAILED for QUEUED + FAIL
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine getNextState should return FAILED for QUEUED + FAIL

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine getNextState should return null for invalid transition
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine getNextState should return null for invalid transition

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine getNextState should return EDITING for PROCESSING + START_EDITING
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine getNextState should return EDITING for PROCESSING + START_EDITING

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine getNextState should return COMPLETED for EDITING + COMPLETE
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine getNextState should return COMPLETED for EDITING + COMPLETE

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine getNextState should return FAILED for any state + FAIL (except terminals)
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine getNextState should return FAILED for any state + FAIL (except terminals)

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isTerminalState should return true for COMPLETED
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isTerminalState should return true for COMPLETED

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isTerminalState should return true for FAILED
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isTerminalState should return true for FAILED

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isTerminalState should return false for non-terminal states
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isTerminalState should return false for non-terminal states

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isInProgressState should return true for in-progress states
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isInProgressState should return true for in-progress states

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine isInProgressState should return false for terminal states
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine isInProgressState should return false for terminal states

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine getAllowedEvents should return correct allowed events for QUEUED
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine getAllowedEvents should return correct allowed events for QUEUED

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine getAllowedEvents should return correct allowed events for PROCESSING
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine getAllowedEvents should return correct allowed events for PROCESSING

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine getAllowedEvents should return correct allowed events for EDITING
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine getAllowedEvents should return correct allowed events for EDITING

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine getAllowedEvents should return empty array for terminal states
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine getAllowedEvents should return empty array for terminal states

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine Complete job lifecycle paths should allow complete success path: QUEUED -> PROCESSING -> EDITING -> COMPLETED
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine Complete job lifecycle paths should allow complete success path: QUEUED -> PROCESSING -> EDITING -> COMPLETED

testcase.classname: Job Lifecycle State Machine Complete job lifecycle paths should allow failure at any stage
testcase.name: Job Lifecycle State Machine Complete job lifecycle paths should allow failure at any stage
